channel.title: Names for weapons any ideas?
channel.description: I am working on a new derivitive of runescape using a 742 client. I have removed all weapons armour and npc's and have started adding new item models and correcting their stats. All I need now are names. Any ideas? Thanks. Regards Frost

item.title: Names for weapons any ideas?
item.dc:creator: @Frost_RSRevamped Frost (RSRevamped)
item.description:
@Frost_RSRevamped wrote:

MacaYork:

I’d stick with the basic metals with bronze to adamant but then after that you could maybe have obsidian for dragon and maybe diamond armour.

Thanks for the feedback this is my development so far http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,633791.0.html

Read full topic
